lead_paragraph: Robbie Keane, the captain of the Los Angeles Galaxy, will be sidelined for four to six weeks after having arthroscopic surgery on his right knee.
snippet: Robbie Keane, the captain of the Los Angeles Galaxy, will be sidelined for four to six weeks after having arthroscopic surgery on his right knee.
abstract: Los Angeles Galaxy captain and 2014 MLS most valuable player Robbie Keane will have arthroscopic knee surgery and miss four to six weeks.
